resources.string:
1. Enable TalkBack (Settings -> Accessibility -> TalkBack). 

2. Enable Explore-by-Touch (Settings -> Accessibility -> Explore by Touch). 

3. Touch explore the Clock application and the home screen. 

4. Go to the Clock application and change the time of an alarm. 

5. Enable ClockBack (Settings -> Accessibility -> ClockBack). 

6. Go to the Clock application and change an alarm. 

7. Set the ringer to vibration mode and change an alarm. 

8. Set the ringer to muted mode and change an alarm.

1. Enable QueryBack (Settings -> Accessibility -> QueryBack). 

2. Enable Explore-by-Touch (Settings -> Accessibility -> Explore by Touch). 

3. Touch explore the list.

1. Enable TalkBack (Settings -> Accessibility -> TalkBack). 

2. Enable Explore-by-Touch (Settings -> Accessibility -> Explore by Touch). 

3. Touch explore/poke the buttons.
